hanzi-su-wiki:
審

Значения

Ясно, подробно; расследование, рассмотрение

Мнемоника

Уголовный розыск — здание 宀, где уточняются разы 番, т.е. факты нарушений закона.

Варианты

审
purpleculture_pinyin:
shěn
to examine; to investigate; carefully; to try (in court)
изучить; исследовать; осторожно; судить (в суде)
rtega_mnemonic:
審審RS
审审		examine, investigate, judge
  • RS. examine (sort rocks from rice under a roof) 宷 the fields 田
  • ⓢ visitor 申 arriving in a house 宀: he's being examined for sicknesses
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 审)
Pictophonetic: 番 indicates the sound; 宀 (courtroom) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
審批 [ shěn pī ]: to examine and approve; to endorse
審查 [ shěn chá ]: to examine; to investigate; to censor out; censorship
審議 [ shěn yì ]: deliberation; pondering; due consideration
審判 [ shěn pàn ]: a trial; to try sb
審美 [ shěn měi ]: esthetics; appreciating the arts; taste
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 宀 [gàimian2] roof; house
    • 番 [ fān ] to take turns, to repeat; to sow; a turn
heisig_chinese_memo: At your divorce hearing you have to listen to the painstaking voice of your judge tell you to roll dice to see who keeps the house. ("I can't believe what I'm hearing!" you say).
heisig_constituent: hearing, house, dice, animal tracks, drop, rice, rice field, brains
heisig_story: The hearing referred to in this character relates to trials in the courts. The elements: house . . . dice.
koohiiStory1: At your divorce hearing the judge tells you to roll dice to see who keeps the house. ("I can´t believe what I´m hearing!" you say).
koohiiStory2: In the courthouse the judge decides your hearing with a roll of the dice.
jp_example_words:
審議(しんぎ): deliberation
審査(しんさ): judging, inspection, examination, investigation
審判(しんばん): refereeing, trial, judgement, umpire, referee
不審(ふしん): incomplete understanding, doubt, question, distrust, suspicion, strangeness, infidelity
審判(しんぱん): refereeing, trial, judgement, umpire, referee
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You're about to enter a roof that has your number on it so you can face the judge. You've been sitting here for what feels like hours, waiting for your number to come up. Finally the time has come—the judge will see you now.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the judge sitting under the roof. Your number is sitting on his big desk, next to the gavel.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The judge is not happy with you. He tells you to come closer and when you do, he takes his gavel and hits you in the shins (しん). Ouch!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You try to ask the judge what his ruling is, but he just hits you on the shins again!
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 番 (つがい、バン номер, черёд).
Ru_Words:
審かつまびらか
  • подробно
  • ясно, определённо
    • warodai
    審しん
  • слушание дела (в суде)
    • warodai
    審議しんぎ
  • обсуждение, рассмотрение
    • warodai
    審査しんさ
  • проверка, рассмотрение, оценка
    • warodai
    審判しんぱん
  • суд
  • спорт. судейство
    • warodai
    不審ふしん
  • недоумение, сомнение, непонятность, странность
    • 主審しゅしん
  • старший судья
    • 予審よしん
  • предварительное следствие, предварительное слушание дела

  • повторное рассмотрение дела, пересмотр решения
Ru_Radicals: 宀 (значок У), 田 (рисовое поле), 米 (рис), 釆 (ногомэ)
Ru_trainchinese:
shěn: (глаг/нареч) исследовать; допрашивать; (книжн.) действительно
shěn: (графема) внимательный, тщательный; (книжн.) знать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: under the roof (宀) it's your turn (番) for a hearing
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Having a monkey in the house would no doubt be painstaking work.
humanum_full_description_en:
Inscriptions on the inscriptions are true. The Five Sacrifices Wei Ding: "Zheng Lin Xun Li said: "Will the woman (you) store the field (No)?" Li Yu Xu said: "I will try to store the Tian Wutian."

"Said Wen": "Xi, Xi Ye. Know the truth. Cong Yu Cong Jia. Interrogation, seal Wen Cong Fan."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The inscription "宀" changed from " rice " from " kou " to "Shuihudi" Qin bamboo slips and Mawangdui Han silk script from "日", the initial meaning of the configuration is unknown, until the " rice " of Xiaozhuan became "釆" " Mouth " becomes " Tian ".
humanum_full_description:
金文表示確實，五祀衛鼎：「正迺訊厲曰：『女(汝)貯田不(否)？』厲迺許曰：『余審貯田五田。』」

　　《說文》：「宷，悉也。知宷諦也。从宀从釆。審，篆文宷从番。」
humanum_short_description: 金文「宀」從「米」從「口」，睡虎地秦簡、馬王堆漢帛書下從「日」，構形初義不明，至小篆「米」訛變為「釆」，「口」訛變為「田」。

  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 宀 [gàimian2] roof; house
    • 番 [ fān ] to take turns, to repeat; to sow; a turn
①詳細，周密：審慎。審視。
②仔細思考，反覆分析、推究：審查。審定。審訂。審覈。審美。審計。審評。審時度勢。
③訊問案件：審理。審判。審訊。公審。
④知道：不審近況如何？
⑤一定地，果然：審如其言。

審字的基本解释

審
shěn
见“审”。

審字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shěn］
［《廣韻》式荏切，上寢，書。］
“宷1”的今字。“审1”的繁体字。
(1)详细；仔细。
(2)详究；细察。
(3)慎重。
(4)察知；知道。
(5)真实。
(6)明白；清楚。
(7)审问；审讯。
(8)指询问。
(9)审查；审核。
(10)古代计算羽毛的量词。犹束。
(11)通“瀋”。水深处。《庄子·应帝王》：“鯢桓之審爲淵，止水之審爲淵，流水之審爲淵。”一说，審当为“蟠”，又作“潘”。水回旋处。见陆德明释文。
(12)副词。确实，果真。
(13)姓。汉有审食其。见《史记·陈丞相世家》。

審字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　審； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页291第22
〔古文〕宷【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?式荏切，音嬸。【說文】悉也。本作宷，从宀从釆。【徐鉉曰】宀，覆也。釆，別也。能包覆而深別之也。今从篆作審。【增韻】詳也，熟究也。【書·說命】乃審厥象，俾以形旁，求于天下。【中庸】審問之。【禮·樂記】審聲以知音，審音以知樂，審樂以知政，而治道備矣。　又【禮·月令】審卦吉凶。【註】謂省錄也。　又【莊子·徐無鬼】水之守土也審，影之守人也審，物之守物也審。【註】郭象曰：無意，則止於分，所以爲審。循本曰：言此理相守，未嘗相離，如水之守土，影之守人，物之守物，審定而不移也。　又凡鞫事曰審。【書·呂?】其審克之。　又束也。【周禮·地官·羽人】十羽爲審。【註】古人徵羽爲旌旄之飾，弓箭之用。審，一束也。　又姓。漢審食其。【正字通】漢郞中審忠，靈帝時上書論曹節等罪惡。　又【韻會】與盤同，水盤旋也。【莊子·應帝王】止水之審爲淵。【註】審音盤。?文云：蟠，聚也。

審字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
審字的起名意思

暂无。

Examine
Basic explanation of words
Examine
shěn
See "Trial".
Examine
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shěn]
["Guangyun" style cut, go to bed, book. ]
The present word for "宷1". Traditional Chinese characters for "censor 1".
(1) Detailed; carefully.
(2) Detailed investigation; detailed investigation.
(3) Be cautious.
(4) Observe and know; know.
(5) Reality.
(6) Understand; be clear.
(7) Interrogation; interrogation.
(8) Refers to inquiry.
(9) Review; review.
(10) Ancient quantifiers for calculating feathers. Still beam.
(11) Through "Shen". Deep in the water. "Zhuangzi·Emperor Ying": "The trial of 鲵桓 is the abyss, the trial of still water is the abyss, and the trial of flowing water is the abyss." In one word, the trial is regarded as "pan" and also "pan". Water roundabout. See Lu Deming's explanation.
(12) Adverbs. Indeed, really.
(13) Last name. Han has tried to eat it. See "Historical Records · The Family of Prime Minister Chen".
Examine

[Ancient text] [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Style 荏切, sound aunt. [Said the text] Xi Ye. This work is 宷, Cong 宀 Cong 釆. [Xu Xuan said] Luo, Fu Ye.釆, don't do it. It can be covered and different. This is from the seal for trial. [Add rhyme] It's also detailed and familiar. 【Book·Said Fate】It is a trial of Juexiang, to be in the world with the help of form. [Medium] Interrogate it. 【Ritual·Yueji】Teach the voice with friend, hear the music to know the music, and check the music to know the politics, and the governance is prepared.　[Li·Yue Ling] Trial of hexagrams is good or bad. [Note] It is also called provincial record.　[Zhuangzi·Xu Wugui] The guardian of water also examines the soil, the guardian of shadow also examines, and the guardian of things also examines. [Note] Guo Xiang said: If you have no intention, it will stop at points, so it is a trial. Xunben said: saying that this principle is to be kept together, and it is not separated, like the guard of the water and the earth, the guard of the shadow, the guard of the thing, and the approval will not move.　Everything is called trial. 【Book·Lu?】It's trial and error.　Supplied again. 【Zhou Li·Diguan·Yuren】Ten Yu is the trial. [Note] The ancients Zhengyu was a decoration of Jing Yan, used for bows and arrows. Trial, a bunch also.　Another last name. Han examines it. [Zhengzitong] Han Yinzhong tried loyalty, and the emperor of Ling wrote a letter on Cao Jie and other crimes.　[Rhyme Club] is the same as the pan, and the water is circling. [Zhuangzi·Emperor Ying] The trial of Zhishui is Yuan. [Note] Audition disk. ? Wen Yun: Pan, Ju Ye.

Name meaning

shěn
вм. 审
Radicals: 宀, 番  (roof, number)
Meaning Mnemonic
You're about to enter a roof that has your number on it so you can face the judge. You've been sitting here for what feels like hours, waiting for your number to come up. Finally the time has come—the judge will see you now.
Picture the judge sitting under the roof. Your number is sitting on his big desk, next to the gavel.
Reading Mnemonic
The judge is not happy with you. He tells you to come closer and when you do, he takes his gavel and hits you in the shins (しん). Ouch!
You try to ask the judge what his ruling is, but he just hits you on the shins again!
